content: pdf pattern sunglasses case english version size finished product sunglasses case size width * length 10*18 cm 4*7 inch crochet level confident beginner format pdf 6 pages 0 8 mb mobile devices friendly language - english the pattern is written using usa crochet terms contains written pattern of the case row by row with photos aprox 10 skills chain stitch slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet materials 1 yarn of group 2 sport 125 m 137 yds / 50 g 1 8 oz 50 g 1 7 oz for example drops loves you 9 schachenmayr catania originals gazzal giza katia capri patons north america grace schoeller + stahl limone inbalit heela paintbox yarns cotton dk lana gatto milo rowan summerlite dk 2 crochet hook 3 0 mm 3 scissors 4 markers 5 measuring tape gauge 22 single_crochet x 26-27 row = 10 cm/ 4 inch in width and 10 cm/ 4 inch vertically for 3 0 mm hook size or size needed to get pattern restrictions please respect my effort don t share copy or post this masterclass without my written permission finished product restrictions feel free to use the finished product as you like you can sell it exchange or donate it however i would very appreciate if you keep the link that it was made by pattern from @madebyasya good luck and great crocheting this listing is for pdf pattern only not the finished item
